channel.title: text tokenizers on Manoj Akondi
channel.description: Recent content in text tokenizers on Manoj Akondi

item.title: Sentiment Extractor - The transformer
item.description: The problem here is to extract group of words or phrase from a given sentence which strongly supports the corresponding given sentiment. So unlike traditional text analysis task, here group of words are to be predicted. Inspired from the idea of how we train a object detector, I have done the same here. I have trained a transformer to identify one hots of ‘boundaries’. For a traditional image detection, we will predict four parameters x,y,w,h.
